name: WorkMotivation
0:
”Alexa, start work motivation.”
”Alexa, open work motivation.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: work motivation
des: Often, work can get stressful and overbearing. When that happens, we need a little push to remind why we strive to do the best we do, everyday. This neat little skill helps you be more productive by reminding you why you work.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
